== Panmana (CT) (628371) ==

Panmana (CT) is a town in the [[Karunagappally]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 10.1 sq. km. and harbouring 7067 households with total population of 29008 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 100 km. Male population is 14098 and female population is 14910. Scheduled Caste population is 2587 and Scheduled Tribes population is 75. Census Location Code of the town is 628371<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 100 km. Railway station is at Karunagappally at a distance of 6 km.
